context_bundle.summary: Authentication Failures (OWASP A07:2021): Weak authentication mechanisms. NIST 2024: 15+ char passwords without MFA, no periodic resets, Argon2id/bcrypt hashing. Implement MFA, rate limit auth endpoints (5 attempts/15min), use secure session management with HttpOnly/Secure/SameSite cookies.

onboarding.quick_start: Auth security: 1) Hash passwords with Argon2id (preferred) or bcrypt, 2) Enforce 15+ char passwords OR require MFA, 3) Rate limit login to 5 attempts per 15 minutes, 4) Use secure session cookies (HttpOnly, Secure, SameSite=Strict), 5) Implement account lockout after failures.
common_patterns: Argon2id hashing: ph = PasswordHasher(); hash = ph.hash(password)
Rate limiting auth: 5 login attempts per 15 minutes per IP/username

known_errors.cause: No rate limiting on login endpoint
known_errors.solution: Implement rate limiting: max 5 attempts per 15 minutes, add CAPTCHA after 3 failures
known_errors.prevention: Use express-rate-limit or similar with skipSuccessfulRequests: true

known_errors.cause: Session cookie accessible via JavaScript (missing HttpOnly)
known_errors.solution: Set HttpOnly flag on all session cookies
known_errors.prevention: Framework session config: cookie: { httpOnly: true, secure: true, sameSite: 'strict' }
